ActorTalk: Yeah, yeah... Alright. I get it. I'll do it your way...
That was close. I almost bumped into them... Thank you, Commandant.
There are some free seats. Let's sit here.
Commandant, you seemed a little off just now at the front desk... and earlier, at the Kowloong Restaurant too. Are you not feeling well?
Could it be from the Immersion Projector? Or maybe just fatigue building up lately...?
I'm a little worried, Commandant. You might need to get some proper rest soon.
There's still a lot I wanted to do with you today, but your health is more important than anything else.
You should probably take it easy for the rest of the day. Let's just sit here at the cafe for a while. I'll stay with you. We can talk, or just relax and enjoy the quiet.
We have plenty of time. Use today to rest and recover, and tomorrow we'll head out and enjoy ourselves.
Of course. Stay as long as you like. I'll be right here with you.
All right. When you've finished your drink, let's take a nice, slow walk back.
Stay with me a little longer.
Let's head back after I finish this coffee.
